sys_script_include.name: GetVehicleDetails

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_f5c4dd2383712210def956d6feaad3d3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1474716_lva.GetVehicleDetails</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetVehicleDetails</name><script><![CDATA[var GetVehicleDetails = Class.create();
GetVehicleDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  getDetails: function() {
    var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
    var rec = new GlideRecordSecure('x_1474716_lva_vehicle_loaner_catalog'); // adjust table name if needed
    if (rec.get(sysId)) {
      var result = {
        vehicle_make: rec.vehicle_make.toString(),
        vehicle_model: rec.vehicle_model.toString(),
        vehicle_year: rec.vehicle_year.toString()
      };
      return JSON.stringify(result);
    }
    return JSON.stringify({});
  }
});

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-06-03 23:50:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>f5c4dd2383712210def956d6feaad3d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetVehicleDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_1474716_lva">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">380367a183a12210def956d6feaad394</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f5c4dd2383712210def956d6feaad3d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-06-04 00:52:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
